scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --workspace client run dev" "npm --workspace server run dev"
scripts.build: npm --workspace shared run build && npm --workspace client run build && npm --workspace server run build
scripts.test: npm --workspace shared run build && npm --workspace client run test && npm --workspace server run test
scripts.test:coverage: npm --workspace shared run build && npm --workspace client run test:coverage && npm --workspace server run test:coverage
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
